synthesis.yield: 30% initially, increased to 85% upon slow evaporation of the mother liquid for 4 days
synthesis.crystal_stability: Stable in air, mother liquid, methanol, and ethanol

X-ray_diffraction.equipment: Siemens D-5000 diffractometer using CuKα radiation (λ = 1.5418 Å)
X-ray_diffraction.method: Le Bail profile analysis using Fullprof software

thermogravimetric_analysis.equipment: TGA-DTA Thermal Analysis SDT2960 equipment coupled to a Bruker Vector 22 IR spectrophotometer
thermogravimetric_analysis.conditions: Approximately 25 mg of sample heated at a rate of 5 K/min from 300 to 1023 K under dry nitrogen flow

magnetic_properties.SQUID_magnetometer: Quantum Design Magnetic Properties Measurement System (MPMS) up to 5 T
magnetic_properties.VSM: Quantum Design Vibrating Sample Magnetometer (VSM) in a 14 T Physical Properties Measurement System (PPMS)

pulsed_field_magnetization.equipment: 65 T capacitor-driven short-pulse magnet at the NHMFL pulsed field facility

electric_polarization_measurements.method: Capacitor plates created on parallel surfaces with silver paint, measured during magnetic field pulses
electric_polarization_measurements.equipment: Stanford Research 570 current to voltage converter
electric_polarization_measurements.conditions: Samples cooled by immersion in liquid 3He, magnetic field pulses up to 10 T
